```{r sampleCode}
test <- read.csv(file.choose(), header = TRUE)
rowCount <- nrow(test)
print(rowCount)
uniqueCouple <- levels(test[1, "BrCrCode"])
uniqueCoupleSize <- length(uniqueCouple)
print(uniqueCoupleSize)
testerSplit <- strsplit(levels(test[uniqueCouple, "BrCrCode"]), "[_]")
print(testerSplit)
```
